results.content: I expected a brief overview of the many ways to interact with SP with code but I instead received a very in-depth overview of not only the basics of SP but some very useful troubleshoot tips that I have already used in my real world SP admin position.
results.content_html: I expected a brief overview of the many ways to interact with SP with code but I instead received a very in-depth overview of not only the basics of SP but some very useful troubleshoot tips that I have already used in my real world SP admin position.

results.content:
It is an amazing course, for me is good that the instructor did not hide his mistakes with edition, I am learning a lot.
Even if Sharepoint 2013 is old the information provided is worth to learn

results.content: A very well course for any Sharepoint developer, I have subscribed to few courses at UDEMY in shaprepoint development, I can say with confidence that this is best among all. The tutor is so straight forward, explains things in details, when errors comes in the code he shows how to debug. So i can give  5/5 rating for this. Thanks Mr Sandeep, I expect similar tutorials from you in future.

results.content: This course on SharePoint 2013 clearly explains all the concepts needed to understand the SharePoint architecture and the development of web sites. Also, it covers up the significance of other application platforms like IIS, Sql Server, and databases which are very much required to run any SharePoint web site. Even though SharePoint installation is little bit complex by its nature, but once installed, we can fully leverage its out of the box functionality to create great web sites which can be used for sharing, searching, and publishing the content in the form of lists and documents. In this course anybody can understand the concept of collaboration across development teams. Advanced topics like visual web parts, SharePoint Apps, and InfoPath are clearly understood and appreciated...

Even though SharePoint installation is little bit complex by its nature, but once installed, we can fully leverage its out of the box functionality to create great web sites which can be used for sharing, searching, and publishing the content in the form of lists and documents.
